lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Because we go into tonight's session, we have some quick announcements to get through, beginning with our wondrous sponsors since the beginning of Campaign Two, our friends at D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need help, do you need help? (drumming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stop doing it at the same time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not going, Sam, okay, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you choke, give us the universal--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Marisha, you've got some announcements.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our first guest yesterday was Mica Burton.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And she was so great and awesome--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I heard that it was Mica.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then the big daddy, this Friday, our four-part miniseries, featuring Brian W. Foster and a few of us here from Critical Role and a few guests, UnDeadwood is airing Friday, October 18th at 7:00pm, and then of course the VOD will be immediately up for Twitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it'll be on YouTube, yeah, it'll be on YouTube.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. (laughs) Seriously, though, you should check out UnDeadwood, it's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to be pretty fucking sweet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And please validate the blood, sweat, and tears that has gone into that, please watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've been busting their ass on this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The production crew has really outdone themselves on that one, so check it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I came to my station today and found two adorable photos of our own Taliesin Jaffe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know why they were here, but I felt it was important for me to share.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got something to talk about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A set of cards for UnDeadwood, and I kind of don't want to pull them out and show them off because the art is so beautiful that I want it to be a surprise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We want to do it justice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check them out in our store, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: ♪ (The Good, The Bad, and the Ugly theme) ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait, I should say that the cards were designed by Kent Davis, who is phenomenal, and he's been a Critter for a very long time, and we love him so very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. He did a character art, it's so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, wonderful folks, I guess with all that said, it's time to jump into tonight's episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! (water bubbling) (thunder rumbles) (explosion) ♪ Role, Critical, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins, they were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends and the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware, 'cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ ♪ They've got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance, roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call ♪ ♪ Diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn, your turn, your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last time, hey, guys, welcome back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys killed him! Sorry, they just found out that it was called a froghemoth from last week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You returned to Nicodranas to begin to gather the allies you did have, discovering that Yussa, the archmage that resides there, and you had had some previous dealings with, has gone missing, seemingly finding himself traveling into the Heirloom Sphere that you had given to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Heirloom Sphere, AKA the Folding Halls of Halas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've forgotten both of those things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Who needs lore? (laughter) Anyway, the servant, Wensforth, of Yussa, requiring aid after three weeks that his master's been missing without any sort of confirmation, communication, or seeming signs of his return, asked you guys for permission to call in an ally. Through his own anxiety, you agreed to allow him to do so, and he called in a female wizard in her, it would be early, mid 50s from a far-off land called Tal'Dorei, known as Arcanist Allura Vysoren.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a few different doorways or paths at your disposal, you climbed up the edge of the mountain that existed in the Garden, and plunged into the cavern there, as you realized, some sort of construct seemed to be following you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that's right, I forgot about the construct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't even tell you were wearing anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ever, what, it looks like your skin is off of your head right here--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like you got really drunk on a transatlantic flight, and then puked in that airplane toilet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's happening with your, did you have an allergic reaction to the spirit gum?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was spirit gum, and I tried to use the spirit gum remover, which is acid, and that hurt a lot, so I stopped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't use spirit gum, use Pros-Aide, what's wrong with--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to have a conversation with you after this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But now there's, my half, my face has spirit gum on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It looks like you're just coming from Electric Daisy Carnival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks to Dani Carr, for the makeup help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't I say that last week, when you were all taped up like you were? I walked in the bathroom, and he had put the bandages on himself, and he had taped his hand completely--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had to go find scissors and cut him out of it because he was going to lose his fucking fingers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got glittery paste across your forehead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After you had all ventured through this tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you wish to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's this place called, Caleb? From the map, what does it say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any passage on any other side of the tower that we can see from here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see all these things floating around? Are there things floating around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see two collide and shatter, and other pieces about 700, 800 feet off to one side, some of them are moving at faster speeds, some slower, some closer, some further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because the curvature of the tower, you can just barely see the top of the doorway that it's emanating from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, the lip we're on continues walkably?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You only have a visual range of what's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it steps, or just a slope?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just because I'm a glutton for punishment, can I walk to the edge and see what down looks like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tower itself seems to bend and shift in strange ways. It's not just a straight, solid tower. It doesn't seem to follow the general laws of physics that you're used to seeing on a material plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab the back of Fjord's armor, just so he doesn't fall forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Below is terrible, perhaps we should go up and forward?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I think any direction, we could go, but I don't know how safe it would be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It continues down, and you can go either way, either curving upward, or to the right, I mean, it's going further down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look down and see if I, I'm going to creep to the edge, do that thing you do on the edge of a cliff, and see if I can spot anything in the down direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have made a perception check as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab the back of Beau's shirt, too, just so she doesn't fall forward either, because I'm already doing that for Fjord, because he just did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one about 250 or so feet down that has a structure on it, with a very faint, I want to say, a faint purplish glow that emanates from it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how reliable direction is on this map, it's not traditional, but there is maybe a down, and maybe up, somewhat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just so we're all clear, down isn't the worst thing in the world.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There could be weapons for us to pilfer and steal there, or borrow or whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or to kill us, but it is certainly interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura is, yeah, she's looking out, as you're facing it outward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura, do you think in the Arcane Armory, there would be things for us to take? Or do you think it would be like dangerous things that we should stay clear of?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To which one? Yes to both?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're already doing better than I would have, "so congratulations."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, we know he had a comparable library, so it stands to reason that he has a vault.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which has probably been pillaged, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Possibly, or he marked that it was there, and walked off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, yeah, Yussa doesn't have much, much use for weapons and stuff, maybe--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If there's a chromatic range, probably is further down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, and maybe if we keep going up the tower, we'll find a red door eventually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just because shit is orbiting, I gave a little jump, do I, is gravity the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the lip, it holds you vertically, but leaping outward, it seems to pull you back this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which way, up or down, up or down? I'm afraid that if we stay here too long, one of those things is going to come after us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half of us go up, and half go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Start down, we could always make our way back up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hopefully. It's 200 feet down. Is there a path from the same way down as there is up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you turn to the right, it continues to rotate downward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah, yeah, odds are we're going to have to go to both, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gravity seems to be strange here, just as time is, so--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we talking right now? Are things moving really slow around you, or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Weird. (very fast) So if I talk like this, do I sound like I'm talking like a normal speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Amusing, but disturbing, yes, it seems "to be dilating the length of the enchantment "on my side, as well. Don't do that, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we'll call you back when we find something else that's interesting or dangerous or life threatening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, run! Which way is it coming from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are just on the lip, and the doorway behind you, you can see a stone hand, and a clawed hand come out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, no, we're going to get trapped going down and we will never get back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about a 10 to 15-foot lip, so it's not super precarious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should move quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Move fast, so that he doesn't see which direction we went, go, go, go, go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just grab Caleb's arm and drag him with me as I run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue rushing downward, hearing the sounds of this thing emerge from the doorway behind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heading downward, you glance off the side a bit, and you can see more of these floating islands and bits of rock. They're not heavily clustered, but there's a handful of them that are visible, and occasionally shifting out of view, past the opposite side of the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do any look jump able from the lip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One's moving faster than the other, and every time it snaps into place, you hear a metal. (metal creaking)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it the way, we have to jump from one gear, like try to time it to where we don't get smooshed, and jump over--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys going to do? It blocks your path.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there gaps when it rotates?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you see through the space?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, one of the gears is about four and a half, five feet high, and a heavier one that's not actually intersecting with that one, but is overlapped, or it is overlapping one behind it that is a wide, 20-foot radius gear that is half emerging out the side of the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we could grab onto one and potentially ride it up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like there's one that it would be less life threatening to do that with? Like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From current point of visibility? There's the four and a half foot one that only a quarter of it is emerging, it's right there, and then the one behind it is much larger, and goes much higher into the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we should jump onto the one going up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ride it all the way around?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, where we don't get squished, but yeah, and jump on at the right time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's partially obscured by the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if we were to ride it up, we would just ride it to a high place, and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before it mashes you into its space into the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But then we could theoretically jump over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you'd be 30 feet up when you do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm good at this shit, let me, I've got Feather Fall and shit, not Feather Fall, but.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So let me see, let me get up in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you sure you don't want some help?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have the whip out, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just got to jump, all of us just jump on a gear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go, and I can maybe try and help catch people? I'm just, I'm going to go first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Beau, you leap up, go ahead and make, for just a straight jump, make an athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you catch yourself, and start being lifted up on that side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we're going to need another way, another way, we've got to find another way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come down here, come down here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to drop and back flip off of the forefront one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Approximately what's the distance across that gear hell fuck--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 10 feet or so of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could potentially jump it, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or fly? Some of you can fly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing? You jump back to where everyone is, or are you still holding on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much time do I have to hold on before I'm fucked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now about halfway up, and 10 seconds, another 10 seconds before--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can also just drop and do this again, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Polymorphing into a giant owl, and I'm grabbing up Nott and Caduceus--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to jump, I've got a little bit of a gap before the hell, mechanical hell pit, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you got 10-foot distance before the rest of the lip continues.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, you're at the top now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As time slows, in the brief moment, as you make this decision--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a thing for this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've already polymorphed, and I'm flying around the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an initiative check for me, this is just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go over to Fjord, say: Don't mind me. And I jump onto his back, piggyback style, and turn into a giant eagle, using my transmutation ability that doesn't use a spell slot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an initiative check, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to cast the spell, and nothing happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That means I'm just piggybacking you right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to think for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Use it on the other side and then retract it, and you can go across it with the whip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got Caleb on your back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who do you think I am?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm going to do Step of the Wind, I'm going to swing around to the other side of the gear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right as it reaches the top point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of, and I'm going to wait for the apex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then, like a swimmer vaulting off of a pool, I'm going to jump and do like a half turn flip gymnast shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got it, right as the lip begins to catch, and you can see in that brief instant, there's just enough of a gap to catch your hand, and then pull you in and mash you into whatever insides of the tower awaiting you, and then at the last minute, you jump off, swivel, back flip, arms spread, keeping yourself as aerodynamic as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your feet catch the edge of the tower, and you push off, and gravity catches you, right as you hit towards the bottom, and you land on the lip of the opposite side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, (wings flapping) flap and land over on the opposite side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How fast is time moving here? I'll cast again if I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fly on the two of us, 4th-level, so we both fly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not like the spell fails, there is no magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there's just that faint blue light, emitting in your direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's going to go ahead and make an attack against you, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So is it Fjord and Caleb against the golem right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you take 13 points of bludgeoning damage, and I need you to make a dexterity saving throw for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to make its second attack. It's going to attempt to bludgeon you, since you're the one that's most, with the other fist, it goes forward, right towards your chest, Fjord, that is going to be a 31 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sort of removes any suspicion of staying and fighting this thing--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why we took a rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and roll initiative now that you're in this moment here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you have not gone yet, so you get to take your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take out the dispelling stone, and I'm going to throw it as hard as I can into its glowing blue face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crashing) The stone just looks like a dull rock when you threw it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool, I'm jumping on the gear, and I'm running to the gear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Fjord, still, on his back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, actually, no, because Caleb, you're on his back, so it's going to go for yours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we get any initiative on the other side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have just landed, and you don't even know what's happening on the other end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but we saw him coming up, we saw the golem coming up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take 11 points of bludgeoning damage, and make another dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use the ring of evasion, a charge to succeed instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 28 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So things on our body are, maybe, not dispelled--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't even want to ask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no, you have the ring of evasion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it failed, so it's got--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So in that brief, thank you for the reminder, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you were wearing it, maybe it didn't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I want to see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, that's its turn, you guys both go at the same time, what do you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I fastened to the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the claw actually, or the collar detaches, and it just stays around your neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a collar on your neck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it free, attached to a wire, is he still holding it? It's just a collar around--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a collar around his neck, and it's free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of like a dull, steel-brushed silver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get the fuck away, keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're helping him. Go ahead and make an athletics check with advantage, because Caleb's helping you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we're going up, I'm trying to understand, there's 10 feet of horrible mechanical death.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then above us is, can we see our friends, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, and you guys, at this point, see now Caleb and Fjord leaping up, and holding onto the side of this gear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See, they're fine, they're right there, look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything above us, like if there's horrible imminent death here, anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just getting squished into the building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up above you, yeah, there's the area where the giant gear pushes into the building, and there's just enough gap there to grab somebody and drag them in, and there's about 25, or 30 feet above you before the lip that you guys had run down previously is above you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait, it's not my turn yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now, because you guys now see them leap up, and you haven't taken any action yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I want to fly up in the air and be at the ready, so that I can snag them if they go to jump to the lip, so I can catch them in my talons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fly over there, and then hold your action, that if they end up falling, you can retrieve them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it, anybody else doing anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you move up a little bit, yeah, they're within 30 feet, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then hit that, and does it work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't work? Do I burn a spell slot, though, or is just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spell slots are burned when you do this, they just don't work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's not in the view of this creature, that's good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if you're in the view of the-- I'm confused.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's just, everything, nothing's working, nothing's working.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I not be an owl anymore, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, let me check one thing real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I was kind of curious if this would work, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want me to even you off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His eyeball, don't hit his other eyeball.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It looks red, are you okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of this makes me sad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm real bad at this game, I'm real bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your spell does not work, but you are still polymorphed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you prepare yourself, anybody else? You land on the other side and catch yourself, and see them holding onto it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do anything, I will just take a big swig of alcohol.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to turn to Caleb and go: We may have to jump, this thing might be our only hope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we going to die up here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you guys are, below, you can see where the rune is, it's blue, it shifts to green.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then this greenish black cloud rises up in your direction. I need both of you guys to roll constitution saving throws for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The colors change?! Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It bounced off your nose, it was so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys both take 27 points of poison damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away is the rest of the group from where we are? Do we see them at the top of the gears?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester you saw fly off, and is off to the side, a little below, maybe about 50, 60 feet off to the side there, and Beauregard and Nott are waiting behind Caduceus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Jester is an owl where she is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to dive towards Jester and free fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Caleb leaps off of your body, out towards where Jester is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And when I get within maybe 10 or 15 feet, I am going to turn myself into a raven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you doing, you guys are on the same initiative order.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to see what happens to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (bird cawing) I don't know what giant owls make.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're waiting, you watch Caleb leap off of you as you're being lifted up higher, higher with the gear, Caleb just leaps off, plummets down, and then turns into a tiny raven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord leaps, as well, off to the side, free fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use my, I'm saving my action to save him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you dive down and catch him at his falling rate, manage to scoop up Fjord, right as you catch up with her as the raven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Certainly doesn't have time to attune to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, what spell were you casting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even though he did it when he's where she is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to try and speak the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Caleb leaps, and you leap after Caleb, and Caleb comes to a spell, and looks confused for a second, and you swoop up both of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to run full speed towards this gate, I assume.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I have some of that flask?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, glug glug glug glug glug!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just fly down to where that island is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm still not okay with any of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That kind of looks like a dick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I legitimately don't know what they're sponsoring right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's never a good sign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The floating island has a door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, there's an island somewhere, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are flying down, currently holding Fjord and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Fjord and Caleb, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are running down, you can see Jester swoop down, and you, if you'd like to land on the island?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll drop them off on the island, and then I'll try to run over and grab the other peeps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, coming around the corner, the golem entity, with two arcane flame jets coming out of the bottom of the feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why is he so bad? But if we go in this door--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to, and then we're in a room with no exit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to stop him from getting over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: ♪ He can fly, he can fly ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- in this direction, he's starting to catch up with you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I lost, I don't know where the other top of this piece went right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, let's roll initiative once more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I get a fear of all my dice as soon as we start anything terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What color is the golem's face right now? Is it still green?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That means his boosters are actually mechanical or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we got one of those, one of his feet, I could probably use that as a jet pack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groaning) I'm going to fly and try to be on the same side, over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what's the speed on your owl?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if it's a closet, what if it's like a pantry, and we're just fucking stuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So let's see here, distance wise, you can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even though I made myself an owl and not an eagle, but whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 60, you can go over here, at 50 feet, and be there fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have 10 feet of movement from here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'm going to-- if I went, would I be able to make it to the top of the ledge right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could. This represents the tower wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, that's not an actual lip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to go 10 feet further away than--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to hold your action, it's up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't cast spells when I'm an owl, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll drop the owl form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drop the owl form? Up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, do it, if that's what you thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to drop the owl form, and ready my ax, just in case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, move confidently in the direction of your dreams.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Jester's turn. So you drop the form, that doesn't take an action. You still have an action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking hell, I don't know what I'm doing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, if you're running to blue face, don't listen to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm far enough away that maybe I could do a spell, and it won't do anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, you could do a cantrip, and just test the radius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He will close the distance before you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't-- why am I first?! Oh god, I'm so nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Time's closing, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Spacred Flame at him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Spacred Flame him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is that a dexterity saving throw?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to Spacred Flame him because it's 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're not close enough, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- everything's going to be canceled the minute he gets to me, so it doesn't make any sense for me to waste a spell right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're just going to hold, you're just going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold, I'm going to hold my spell of-- I'm going to hold Duplicity. I'm going to hold Duplicity, for if he is not blue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Now, the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the stupidest. I'm so dumb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I figured that the owl would drop if he got close enough anyway, and then I didn't want to be in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does so, it's going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as it washes over the island, the sparkling doorway, which, as you guys land and look at it, it's this shifting purple shimmer, it blinks out, and it's just an empty archway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's only if he's looking at it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we needed that door, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll come back as soon as he goes away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we just got to get his attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As its other action, it's going to fly over 15 feet, this direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could have stayed an owl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? All right, Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull my transmuter stone out my pouch, and then start hammering it on this collar, trying to break it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You going to move, or stay put?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're on a rock. I'll go to the furthest edge that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry, no, sorry, it's Beau and Nott now, sorry, my bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was Caleb after Jester, is that what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the golem, then Beau and Nott, and then it's Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would have been really good information to have before my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but you're just learning things as you begin to see the creature. This is the first time you really saw it, was this moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away is he from us right now? Or from the island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could estimate somewhere between 50 to 60 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to rub my palms together and then activate my maelstrom gloves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do take two points of lightning damage, but the gloves now are thrumming in power.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa! Do I have an attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to Hadouken chi charge this, and I want to hold my action until he gets within 20 feet of me, and then I'm going to blast him with some lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're moving to the edge and holding your action? Is that what you're doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we can't hurt this thing, can we? It's got a million hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe water will break him, if he's a machine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Try something. Don't assume anything, just try something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will-- I mean, he's not looking at me, but that doesn't mean I'm hidden, right? This is not a sneak attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then I will bonus action hide? There's nowhere to hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, shoot him in the face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the face! All right, I'm going to rush back to that thing, that tower thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's even farther away. How far can I shoot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is the range on your hand crossbow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I will bonus action hide, and then shoot at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great, wait, do I get advantage on stealth, because I got my cloak?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't even see a second dice in his hand, it was just like he pooped it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, then it canceled out, there's no advantage because you had disadvantage, so it's just a single roll, remember?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I don't get sneak attack if it hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the problem with the long range on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait, but that was a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that was a stealth check, I thought it was the attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, okay, that's fine, but for your attack roll, you do not have advantage or disadvantage--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, your stealth check wasn't a disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it, so then I shoot at a 16 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the bolt release, and it fights the gravity for a second and impacts the side of its shoulder, and just reflects off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends their turn, Caleb? You spend your time banging the necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to smash it. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will use Mask of Many Faces to try and make myself look like Halas?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I try and chop the collar off?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, give it a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, have you unsummoned it since last you used it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I mean, I've just had it, yeah--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you probably had it, and it'd still have the glow around you, so it's still invoked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you haven't, you haven't uninvoked it. Oh, actually, you did sheathe it when you leaped up onto the gears. You would have to resummon it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can summon the sword with a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you summon the sword, though? Is that magic?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I have a little dagger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a lock on the collar?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but it goes in a keyhole, and locks it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll move, I'll move over there by Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, actually, with my action, is there anything on the collar that looks like a hinge, a clasp, a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I'll put it this way. Mask of Many Faces, trying to cast it is an action, so you don't have your action, but you can make an investigation check to see if there's some sort of mechanism to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not intended for a key, but there is a section where it locked onto his neck that probably could be disabled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slowly heading its way in an awkward zigzag path over towards the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it, I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said interesting. That's good, these are good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move up to the edge, look towards it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have a lot of time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did the door come back as soon as the...?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have a lot of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your sword summons. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long does that spell last?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shout at us what you see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck balls, I have to use Polymorph again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know why he turned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, that's the only option, is to use Polymorph again, yeah? To get everybody across?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, maybe check out and see what room we're in first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair note, if you just jump, you'll keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he go down and out, or just out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw him at an angle, like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to jump into an abyss of doom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can see how far you can go, go, try--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, she's going to toss me over the edge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to toss Nott as far--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Nott, you come over to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got my Castlevania whip at the ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Guide me-- wait, you didn't guide me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just had a thing happen, and I'm okay--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your body gyrates, and you begin to drift at an outward angle, but you're going low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are now plummeting faster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At like fall speed, or at slow speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, I'd say it's probably at a fall speed out this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you drift from your falling speed to about there, but you are about 20 feet below.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do not try to catch it if it does like you did before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'm going to have, if you want to try, because you're not trying to avoid it, you're trying to grab at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I'm not trying to avoid this, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'll actually give you advantage on the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) And pull her back onto it, so Nott, you get up onto the side here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau-- Nott, technically, you were just thrown and grabbed, you still haven't taken an action yet on your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I cast Feather Fall-- that's a reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Caleb, do you have a rope? Fjord, do you have a rope?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try to unlock the thing on Caleb's neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can use it as an action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not an unlocking key. That's a locking key.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So are you going over to, using your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go look and see what's going on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're still in initiative order at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're inspecting it, it's probably unlockable, but it's a little obtuse as to how you-- it would take you a little bit of time to try it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For my turn, I would have also started moving in the direction that the island's going to be moving to, just to try and keep--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, okay. Well, then I'm fine then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what are the rest of you guys doing? There's now this large gulf between you and the island, and the creature is plummeting and falling out that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You had slow-- you had-- so okay, I'm going to go back--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can polymorph. I can polymorph on the next turn, and try to fly us all across.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, yeah, that's better, because I can't do the whipping, and you're right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys want to go through the door, and we'll just go through the door as soon as it's--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he wakes back up, that door's going to go away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we got to go through the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb grabs Nott's hand and drags her through the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what if-- We have Feather Fall and nobody-- okay, bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just look over the edge, the three of you, well, you've, you took your action in pushing Nott off of the side. What are you two doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess, so I've got to wait for, wait a little bit of time before Fjord gets an action again, to try this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I have anything, I'm going to cast Bless on the three of us because I got nothing better to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Jester, Beau, and Caduceus all have Bless? All right, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I'll hold my action until anybody--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So top of the round now. Technically, I let you go since the golem was falling, so now it's the golem's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's stabilized, and it's going to rotate its face--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not farther away than that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back toward the island, the doorway flickers out, shortly after Caleb and Nott vanish through it, and you feel the blue light come upon you, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Jester, Beau, and Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we've got to fight this thing a little bit now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you want to be an owl again, I could ride your back and shoot lightning--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like from behind him? I'd have to try to fly--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who has this big-ass healing potion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. Okay, can't drink it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to transform into a giant eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pick up-- (owl sound) I'm going to pick up Caduceus, but I'm going to swoop and let Beau climb on the back of my neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Beau, your fists still charged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How close do you have to be in order to make that thing work, those things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now, his cone is a 3D cone, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything in this space right here--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can always turn on his turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know we can turn on his turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll say for the purposes of just keeping you aware of where it is, I'll leave that there, because you can see the blue light emanating from the front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The only option is to go high and get above, and try to, if he cancels us out, then we'll drop to the island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're going to have to go 60 feet straight up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's a cone, so 60 feet at its highest, so it's probably--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, if he looks up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, regardless, what do you guys do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go, zoom, and try to be high, like around here, to where I'm above the cone, and also above the island.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can to about-- above the island, you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, above the cone, above the island.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the faint drifting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, is that close enough for Beau to do her shit? Are we within 20 feet of it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 feet is the square in the middle of that island, for reference.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those measuring things are awesome, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Onto his back, do you want to...? She's on my back, so she'd have to jump and then land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus, you already used your action to cast a spell, so you're out of actions on this one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not a bad idea, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could leap. You're in leapable territory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Caduceus, you guys are within probably 30-ish or so feet from the creature. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least I'm an eagle now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try Command one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to try Command one more time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love jumping off things, so I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, try it, because he might be able to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it turns around, rights itself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it then drift further out and power it off a second time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is way over there now. This vanishes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can fly in and go through the door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will I fit through as an eagle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The door? We made it out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because of two Command spells?! Amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But the golem will be there when we come back? Or he could come through the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, it's a little door, and I barely fit through as an eagle, and he's way bigger than that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to destroy the doorway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll put a tripwire next to it so he'll fall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no other door yet out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Out of the frying pan and into the fire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll find out, we'll find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, seriously, we would have been fjucked.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: So even with advantage on it, it got a 14.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting) and then an extra, okay, here we go. Okay.

lines.text: The Fireball explodes with extreme anger and fury, as the arcane flames dissipate and the smoke vanishes, you can see the golem, its metallic portions of its body, which is the majority of its parts, are now heated bright orange. Takes no damage, and what elements of it looked slightly scuffed--

lines.text: That's a big bag of dicks, right there.

lines.text: But you do know, don't use fire now.

lines.text: Yeah, but it's going to, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you might have one more move before--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he's far, far, far away from me right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's starting to shut off. It doesn't take the action until its turn, technically, so you do the Command, you know it worked, and you see it flickering, and when it takes its next turn, it's going to shut off, just so you know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to dig those things out of the pile that I see glowing, because--

lines.text: One of them Caleb is holding, and it's--

lines.text: Oh, it's just the two boxes?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Yeah, shoot a lightning ball at it, Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'm just going to hold my action as a heal--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I'm holding a Healing Word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm backing to the corner. I'm just going to see who needs it most.

lines.text: I don't think we're going to find a door, man.

lines.text: So there might be, or maybe this is one of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying, whatever it is, Caduceus finished his turn, and Nott, what are you doing?

lines.text: There aren't enough boxes to hide in, so you move back into the crates, and make a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have advantage because of your cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, you got it, Beauregard, you're up.

lines.text: Is the box a door, Nott? Is the box a door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, there's no doors over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, okay, I am going to turn around.

lines.text: All right, (counting) that's your general movement to get yourself there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cannot double jump. 45, right, right, right? Dash, dash.

lines.text: Yes, for Step of the Wind.

lines.text: Do I see anything on him as he's powering off that looks like an arc reactor, or a battery, or a sparkling gem?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: You uppercut, and as your fist hits this front of its chest, it just glides off of the armor, the stone shell of itself too strong for you to impact.

lines.text: Another one, as you walk by, you can see a portion of its chest is swollen with stitches, and where it cracks open, you can see a large mouth where a tongue hangs out.
